caption.center: Llewyn J. COWART v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 1983 from Judgment dated July 11, 1990, Durward Gray Evans, Ruling Judge, Sunflower County Circuit Court.
opinion.attorneys:
Llewyn J. Cowart, pro se.
Mike C. Moore, Atty. Gen., John L. Clay, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, Leonard C. Vincent, Parchman, for the State.
opinion.panel: Before ROY NOBLE LEE, C.J., and PRATHER and SULLIVAN, JJ.
